(amụrụ na Nọvemba 6, 1972), nke a maara dị ka Focus..., bụ ónyé America na-emepụta egwu si New York City. O nwetara nnukwu nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ egwu mgbè ọ bịanyere áká na Dr
Kemgbe ahụ, o mepụtara egwu màkà ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ama ama, gụnyere Dr

Dre, Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, Snoop Dogg, Rick Ross, John Legend, The Game, Ice Cube, Busta Rhymes, Fabolous, 50 Cent, Schoolboy Q, Joe, Christina Aguilera, Jennifer Lopez, Beyoncé, Lil Wayne, Ameriie, Christina Millian, Mac Dre, Marsha Ambrosius na ndị ọzọ.
bụ nwa nwoke nké Bernard Edwards nwụrụ anwụ, ónyé guzobere disko na R&B band Chic. A mụrụ ya na Manhattan, New York City, ma zụlite ya na Tri-State Region. Edwards Jr
na-eto nna ya màkà ịhụnanya ya maka mmepụta nke egwu, nke ọ mepụtara site na nwata, na-aga ọtụtụ oge studio na nna ya.
